reviews.review: 非常棒的一款游戏
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=muJYTeQlvC4
很棒的游戏！战斗方面很有意思；剧情非常棒，让玩家很容易被剧情内容所触动，同时也值得推敲和思考，人物刻画方面也很好，伊丽莎白妹子很讨人喜欢，在战斗和探索中也会尽可能的给予玩家帮助；总之还没玩过本作的玩家快剁手吧，绝对物超所值。
It's like Dark Souls bu- BOOKER CATCH

First time playing this game, cant really say "first time playing franchise" as i have played some of the first game
Initial thoughts - Heard a lot about it, saw some gameplay, wasnt that interested but through some convincing from friends I bought it.
1st hour of game - Slow start but its pretty interesting. Cool designs and graphics. Also im pretty sure i spent an hour on the mini games because i thought it gave me something.
2nd hour - Boiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii this game is lit. Mechanics and the story hooked me in instantly. I love it, all the jumping around using the lines and the powerups you get just make this game so much more interesting. Also love the fact that I can choose what gun I want to use, and im not limited to what the developers want. I brought a goddamn sniper to fight off abraham lincoln with a gatling gun in a museum????????????? LIKE WHAT, thats genius. 
3rd hour - Love the duo conversation going on between main protagonist and elizabeth. The developers did a good job making elizabeth a very loving character and make Brooker and even better character.
4th hour - am still hooked on the game, powerups are very simple and easy to follow. Developers do a really good job making the bad guys into the most gruesome assholes you have to face off. 
5th hour - Fun but its kinda to easy, even on standard the ai's are really stupid and easy to kill. Didnt really get down at all my entire run through and i suck at shooting games, Would recommend putting the difficulty on high.
6th hour - Fun game but the story is confusing.
7th hour - :( sad that the game is really short and that i've almost finished it. The maps and mechanics in this game is seriously no joke. I have never gotten bored of this game once because the different maps and gameplay of this game was just that good.
8th hour - ?????????? Developers just plopped out the entire storyline in like 3 minutes of dialogue at the end, trying to explain it but im just like ??? What the hell are you talking about.  Had to search up the ending on a wiki to figure it out. I mean this doesnt change my opinion of this being a great game and all but if you really care about the storyline of a game, this one will trigger you indefinitely.

Moronic. Good looking game with a fancy city in the clouds and magically, you have to kill everyone and everyone is trying to kill you. I guess they all need to die, and that's what you are there for. A story so dumb I quit at about the 1 hour mark. Have no idea why Steam says I played this for 17.3 hours - i didn't.

I had a great time beating the single player story on the hardest difficulty. I like the story in Infinity less than the first one but more than the second one. The Burial at Sea DLC however made this title the best overall. If you haven't already, go play the first Bioshock.
This game blew my fucking mind. The ending did not hit me until moments before the game was ending. I cried an ugly cry, and was heart broken for days after. <3 Would play again, 10/10.
so if you understand quantum physics you won't after this game but you will too.
great game just buy it already
Bosslar idare eder savaşlar bi süre sonra sıkıyo ama hikayesi çok güzel

2017年8月18号   11：29
        10分钟前刚打完生化奇兵无限的DLC海葬两部曲和主线剧情， 整个游戏花费了20个小时其中5个小时是来自DLC。这是我第一次去用心体验剧情一个游戏，以前也玩过不少游戏，但这种剧情向的游戏接触的很少，因为个人以前认为这种游戏有些浪费时间，不如快餐游戏的体验直观爽快。这一个系列的游戏，尤其是无限，改变了我对游戏的一系列不正确的看法，先抛开剧情不说，因为真的很难理解，在完成主线剧情后我查阅了wikipedai和贴吧的部分资料才慢慢明白了这宏大的世界观和作者要讲述的故事主线。

        总的来讲，这是一款结合了平行宇宙，架空历史，幻想，科幻，蝴蝶效应，世界线的变动，时间悖论，蒸汽朋克，反乌托邦和一些宗教艺术（教堂里放的Will the Circle Be Unbroke真的好好听）的多元化的游戏。平行宇宙，世界线的变动和时间悖论使的剧情扑朔迷离，令人寻味，勾起你对结局的探索。架空历史和反乌托邦的设定使得的游戏很符合当时18世纪末至19世纪初人们对乌托邦的美好幻想。蒸汽朋克城市和交通工具还有富有宗教艺术的建筑群使得游戏的画面唯美如画，着实是让人陶醉。

        这款游戏的表现力有很多可圈可点的地方蒸汽朋克和宗教艺术就不用多说了。我对艺术这方面没有做过很多研究，就说一下个人的直观感受吧。在高画质的条件下人物的建模是非常不错的（小姐姐水汪汪的大眼睛好漂亮），这种卡通画风的人物表现力有时也不亚于3A大作精细的人物描绘。建筑物的远近也有十足的层次感，在远处的飞艇也在云层中有若隐若现的感觉。在开头的教堂中是我感觉全作中最美的地方，雕像和壁画都是都充满了的宗教艺术的风格。画面这方面我最想点出的是这个游戏的光污染或是渲染，游戏中阳光的渲染会让你感觉到你是在一个真正的天空之城，阳光就在头顶触手可及。但是你会感到在游戏中这种效果被运用的很是夸张，也就是有些过头，过度的光污染会让游戏体验变得很差（这个简单几句说不明白，需要你们自己体验）我调过亮度好像并没有什么很明显的变化。随着剧情的推进，风格变得逐渐的阴沉黑暗，这个问题也就很简单的解决了，这个问题只会出现在游戏的前期，对游戏的整体体验来说，无伤大雅。在细节这方面也体现了游戏制作组的用心，可以看出游戏中的很多物品或是摆设都是那个时代的产物，例如留声机，黑胶唱片机，齿轮工艺和自动售货机还有可以灵活穿梭的空中滑道。整体来说游戏的画面有一种让人身临其境的感觉，在配上符合当时时代特点的古典音乐和随处可见的留声机，黑胶唱片机和那个可以看黑白影像的机器（是叫放映机么？），逼格更高了有没有？

     剧情。。。。。额。。。。。。。。。。这个嘛。。。。。。。。。

        这一作的剧情我觉得是最难理解的，平行世界，空间裂隙（还是时间裂隙....我记不清了），时间悖论，蝴蝶效应，世界线的变动，想一想这些这些东西都很玄学。
剧情这方面我不是想说太多，好的剧情只有自己去体会去理解才会知道它好在哪里。不说废话了，这款游戏的结局是悲伤的，但是没有那种我辛辛苦苦玩了这么久你突然就死了的那种感觉，到最后总有一种依恋和不舍。但是游戏的结局是有点突然，缺少了一些应有的过渡的桥段。支线任务没有明确的指示，每一次完成的都很莫名其妙，支线任务会介绍一点有关剧情的内容，建议去完成一下。宏大的世界观和多个平行世界的设定看上去很复杂，相对矛盾的地方几乎没有，剧情也相对连贯通畅，庞大的世界观让剧情变得非常的丰富，我个人感觉有点解密向的味道。活在无限循环中的布克最终得到了解脱，只剩下一个还没有经历洗礼的布克与自己的女儿过上了平凡人的生活。最后的结局也点明了本作的主题，无限。
 
                                      良心DLC（我指的是海葬）（玩完以后有种说不出的伤感）
 
        这个DLC算是一代的一个补充剧情，故事是发生在一代之前不久，故事的地点是在海底城，但主角是我们熟悉的布克（或者说是康姆斯托克）和伊丽莎白，有点像一代的前传。DLC的质量很高剧情也一样烧脑，把经典的生化奇兵三部曲连成了一个圆（从第一代的开始到第三代的完结，再到海葬DLC又回到了第一代的开始）。真是完美。

        最有特点的是海葬第二章，我们操纵的人物是伊丽莎白，走的是像耻辱一样的潜行路线，也增加了新的潜行用的异能和冷兵器，增加了敌人AI的警觉度。我玩的困难难度，在这个难度下硬干基本上没有胜算，喜欢硬核潜行的玩家可以尝试。这个DLC大部分内容和一代没有很多重要的联系，可以单玩（不是很推荐，但问题不大），然后再去玩一代。

        关与游戏性这一方面，想法新奇的异能系统可以很好的辅助战斗，虽然异能种类繁多，但是有很多异能的作用是几乎相同的（控制敌人让敌人无法反击），比较实用的也只有三四个。一个亮点是游戏场景中设计的滑行轨道和吊钩，这个设计可以让你灵活的在敌人之间穿梭，靠近敌人和躲避攻击，我个人认为这是个比较实用的设置，算是游戏一个很有特点的地方了。跳上滑行轨道和吊钩的动作十分流畅，也十分真实，主角会助跑起跳，落地斩杀和暗杀会触发相应的动画。

另一个就是有点像无主之地中的自动售货机了，有三种不同的售货机，一个是出售子弹血量和魔法值的，另两种分别是升级武器和升级异能的，这种升级系统可以很好的选择升级你偏好的异能和枪械，说实话枪械那些关于后坐力和精准度什么的升级我在游戏中一点也没有感觉，不过异能的升级挺有用的。说道升级系统还有一种魔瓶可以增加护甲，生命值和魔法值。总之可玩性比较高。

我个人感觉这不是一个合格的FPS游戏，射击手感有一些欠佳，手枪用起来像玩具枪，毕竟买点是剧情吗，这个可以理解。但是一次只可以带两种武器就有点难受了，每一次换武器都是一个艰难的选择（好怀念以前的军火库Jack）。武器的种类还是比较多的，只是比较多。收集的元素就不多说了，反正就是翻箱倒柜的找。游戏里我会去每个房间去翻每个橱柜和箱子，去找每一个录音，然后用我并不精通的英语去反复的听里面的内容，去理解大致的意思。有一点我十分的不满，那就是游戏的路线提示了，玄学指路，地上的箭头经常来个什么反向绕路。

我最想拿出来单独说的是NPC了，每一个NPC都拥有自己的背景故事，你可以在留声机和支线任务中去发现。几个重要的NPC塑造的非常成功，整个故事像一个大齿轮，而NPC们像一些小齿轮来保证大齿轮的运转。在游戏中有一句话我记得十分清楚“在战斗中你无须保护伊丽莎白，她会照顾好自己。”让人省心，她还会和你一起作战为你递弹药和医疗包，帮助你制造裂隙，让你在战斗中取得优势和提供资源。

优点
画面唯美如画
人物模组精细
电脑配置要求不高平民游戏
多样的升级系统可玩性高，花样多
多样的异能和枪械相互配合可玩性高
剧情过硬
良心DLC
Steam版经常白菜价
收集系统简单
架空世界毫无违和感
音乐和画面配合堪称完美

缺点
过度的光污染
射击手感平庸
DLC在存档时很慢
蹲下和冲刺时有搞不明白的冲突
武器种类偏少
搜集点难找机关较多
任务引导系统。。。呵呵
没有用处的武器升级选项
高难度的敌人AI只会变强不会变聪明
不能随时存档
有玩家反应高配电脑带不起来游戏（手动滑稽）
你晕3D我也没办法

忘了件很重要的事 啊

I'm not one to usually review games but this one deserves it. I'll be brief.

The game starts off unbecoming and doesn't really give much of itself away, but by the end you realise you just sat through one of the most twisted, incredible, well written and well built games to come out this side of the millenia. It doesn't top the list; perhaps there could have been better attention paid to the fine details, ensuring the player didn't occasionally get stuck or a key wouldn't actually sit inside the lock, but none of these issues are either game breaking, ruining, or just bad craftsmanship. Instead, the visuals, the story, the animation and the audio - that sweet symphony of voices, cues, ambient auras and ship distress alarms - paint a perfectly concocted narrative around you. And while I did find myself somewhat lost, and some nights spending much more time walking about and searching every single visible location for goodies and hidden doors and spamming the F key like a man with Parkinsons', despite the fact that I failed to pick up on the true depth and theme of the story until much to late and left myself somewhat befuddled, and, despite dropping interest in the game early on through my first time playing to play other things with friends, none of that stands a candle to the inferno that this game turned out to be, and each and every one of these faults, if you could call them that, relate to anything other than user error, or simple preference on my part. 

The fact stands, after all has been said and done: this game carries ticks in all the boxes. It's a tight and seamless FPS game, with solid gunplay and challenging enemies, intriguing bad-ass weaponry and the opportunity for upgrades for your favourite ones. Vigors are fun, stunning, and even more bad-ass than the guns, and in combination turn you into a M'F'ing warrior dashing around and snapping necks faster than a team of Genjis. The story is fantstic, less linear and predictable than DOOM for me, a point that was one of my more meh points about that game, and it is held aloft by the audio and video the game provides, a veritable candy-store of beautiful models, shining worlds and crisp details. Elizabeth is beautiful - the Vox are animalistic - Comstock is fatherly, and eveyone else fits in to the cast like a brilliantly cast play. As I said above, and reitorate here; any faults this game has are far, far outshone by it's wildly successful strengths.

If you have not played this, I cannot more highly reccomend you do. It is well, well worth the price, and is, being older now, priced much better than other AAA titles you may be considering - perhaps DOOM, as an example - would be. 

So until you delve into the world of Booker DeWitt, I leave you with this;
Will you bring us the girl, and wipe away the debt? 
[i]And do you have a choice anyway?[/i]

Lembro de ficar super Hypado com o lançamento desse jogo com um trailer em 2010(lançamento era pra ser 2012 mas né...). não consegui jogar quando lançou, mas quando consegui, meua migo, foi amor a primeira vista, que visual, que direção de arte, que trilha sonora, parece que a equipe deu o máximo de esforço pros menores detalhes, é realmente impressionante, a jogabilidade é fluída e não lembro de me frustrar em nenhum momento com ela, intuitiva e simpes, mas muito divertida. o enredo é fantástico, de cair o queixo do início ao fim. A única coisa que eu tinha ficado chateado era esse bioshock não ter cara de bioshock por ser "muito colorido e alegre", mas queimei minha língua na segunda metade do game, quando toda a atmosfera pesada, stempunk e dark com muito terror caiu com peso em todo o jogo, e a partir daí o jogo deixou de ser ótimo e passou a ser fantástico! 
Lembro de ter me arrepiado em vários momentos, mas um específico é quando em uma certa boss fight, a trilha sonora é Lacrimosa cantada por uma mulher de forma toda distorcida..
Muitas coisas a dizer sobre esse jogo, mas vou poupar spoilers, recomendo totalmente!

Acabo de terminar el juego y me quito el sombrero, creia que seria muy dificil superar al Biosock 2 y tela el despriege que hacen en el Infinite la historia es...Fuaaa...esque no quieros contaros nada pero es sin duda el juego de accion en primera persona con la mejor historia que jamas se alla escrito...crema para el coco.

One of the best games I have played in a long time. Not only is the AI Elizabeth incredibly likeable but you warm to her throughout the game, and she is incredibly useful in battle, giving you endless supplies of ammo and salts. The game builds up throughout, and the ending blew me away. To think a game could keep such a twist secret until you finish the game is remarkable. 
I picked this up for £20 on offer, but would pay full price any day of the week.

Booker, catch!

Кто-то мечтает о деньгах. Кто-то мечтает о любви. Мой отец мечтал об океане огня. Нам дали Эдем, но мы превратили его в Содом. Разве мы заслуживаем спасения? Господь дал Ною рыбу, наслав потоп. Но со мной он был строже... Он сказал: пророчица, подготовь мне народ рыбаков. Как и мой отец, я знаю всё, что будет и чего быть не должно... И что Господь получил в обмен на свои дары? Еву и её яблоко? Содом и Гоморру? Род людской наделал столько долгов, что смыть их мог только потоп. Что такое Колумбия, если не новый ковчег?... Один человек обещал освободить меня от цепей. Но потом бросил меня ради своей выгоды. Хотя в чём-то я ему даже благодарна: он показал мне цену веры. Господь, как и я, поверил в людей, и разочаровался в них... Стоит ли нас спасать, если мы не можем спастись? Не будет спасения, покуда города и равнины не поглотит огонь... Этот мир родился заново, и теперь пришёл черёд миллиона иных. Крещение — это перерождение души. Но иногда на пути встаёт разум. Если разум противится, надо показать ему самого себя во всех проявлениях. Он либо уступит, либо перестанет существовать.Публичное обращение Элизабет.

This game is a fucking masterpiece.

Albeit it is only 9 hours of gameplay, you feel immersed every single minute.
The plot is very well made and it flows perfectly.

It's definitely not for the shooting that you'll keep playing, but for HER.

There's also a massive twist at the end. Nothing can prepare you for it.
Play it, it won't take you long to finish it. I swear you won't regret it. Except if your files are corrupted or whatever. If that, then reinstall it.

10/10.

神作！其清新阳光的画风一改前作，而又随着剧情推进，风格渐渐阴沉黑暗，音乐的配合更是恰到好处。
  古典风，配以超前的想象，蒸汽朋克般的架空世界，引人深思的剧情，未来与过去的结合，自然优雅的动作表情，紧张刺激的战斗，为我们展现了一座天空之城不为人知的秘密。结局更是发人深思，记忆犹新。

The gunplay and action in infinite are major steps back from Bioshock 2. No variety in ammo types, most vigors (plasmid equivalents for infinite) do the almost the exact same thing as each other. Combat is mostly at long range, while the ADS system is terrible. Shoot people until they die is always the method of advancing.

The story itself takes nearly the whole game to get interesting. I enjoyed the ending, but the large number faults doesn't make up for it. It did not feel like a bioshock game.

They got rid of the gene tonic abilities, neutered the plasmids, got rid of hacking, got rid of ammo types, and got rid of the inventory system to turn the game into a linear shooting gallery.

In the first two games, voice recordings were placed in locations were they could logically be thought to be found. In infinite, they are placed all over the map.

Instead of hacking, there's lockpicking. Which is just decided by whether or not you have a lockpick. No skill involved.

[spoiler] It also adds weird supernatural elements to the game. Why is there a ghost in a bioshock game? Why can the dead be raised? It doesn't keep true to the feeling of the orignial. 

The skyhook was criminally underused. I would have been nice to use it to explore the whole city and go back and forth. [/spoiler]

The Bioshock games have been the fresh breath of air in an era where FPS games are mostly military shooters in one form or another. Bioshock Infinite is no different. What this game falls short on is delivering a conclusive narrative as the game felt more and more directionless closer to the ending. Regardless, it does tell a nice story through somewhat presentable manner and its Victorian and colonial aesthetics sure look like a treat.

Magnum Opus!!!

昨天晚上，我梦见我站在海滩上，在手风琴的伴奏下，和伊丽莎白一起跳着快步舞。
当斑斓的冒险最终被抹去，只留下一个“圆满”的起点。这对于保留着这段美好记忆的我们来说，太残酷了。也太真实了。

主人公は探偵ブッカー・デュイット。
酒とギャンブルによる多額の借金を抱える彼は、ある夫婦から依頼を受けます。
「エリザベスという娘を連れて来い、連れてきたら借金は帳消しだ。」
ブッカーにとっては受けない理由のない依頼。受けて連れて来られたのはある灯台でした。
空に浮ぶ都市コロンブス、預言者カムストック、そして幽閉された少女エリザベス。そこから物語が始まるのです。
DQ1やスーパーマリオシリーズのような姫を助けるだけの一直線の物語でなく、物語を通じてさまざまな過去が明らかになり、それらが収束しひとつの真実となります。終盤からエンディングにかけての畳み掛けはぜひ味わって欲しい作品です。
純粋なFPSの難易度としても申し分なく、難易度NORMALでも十分歯ごたえがありました。
過去作未プレイでも十分楽しめる作品だと思います。

剧情很棒，节奏紧凑，但是射击手感一般，作为射击游戏来说不合格。流程很长，优化也好，我玩时间长了有嘈杂的电流声，超能力很多，好用的少。我是比较喜欢杀戮乌鸦，和火球，以及奔马。3代是收官之作，dlc把1,2的剧情连起来了。[spoiler] 虽然我没玩过1,2。[/spoiler]推荐打折的时候一起买。
剧情、叙事和演出令人满意（就是有时候光污染比较严重），但是游戏性一般，可互动内容比较少，玩起来比较单调，任务引导也有点不够意思.......
Great game

It's basically Call of Duty in a cloud city, but with a better story. It's worth a playthrough, but it's probably not worth the purchase unless on sale. I really wish there was a "sort of" category instead of a binary choice between yes and no. The gameplay alone is sort of meh, but everything taken together puts it a little ahead of the "no" category.

As an addendum, I love first person shooters, but I'm against the need to make everything call of duty. Had they not tried to take inspiration from the dime-a-dozen military shooters and apply that philosophy to Bioshock, this game could have been so much more.

If I could give this neutral, I would. It's a game which you play for the story and learning about the lore in the world. The game itself is pretty weak interms of mechanics.

Pros:
- Compelling story which is a bit confusing but once you play everything and listen/read the audio logs it all comes together
- Memorable characters
- Pretty looking game

Cons:
- Gun system is conter productive, they created so many different weapons only for the player to be allowed 2 at once;
 the only guns you need to use are the carbine/sniper since they are the most accurate/damaging (this changes in the dlc though).
- Vigor system is there just because it has Bioshock in the title, most of them are completely useless. Possesion and Devils kiss are the only ones you will need to use/upgrade.
- Most enemies just point guns and shoot at you, most of the arena fights are just waves of enemies flooding in not caring for their self preservation.
- Elizabeth just serves as a blockade in combat, getting you stuck on doors or various props. She tries to get out of the way but she may aswell just not be there during fights (her ability in combat should have just been a Vigor for Booker, since she doesn't even need to be near the thing you want to activate).

tl;dr: Good game for the story, characters and the world, bad game for actual gameplay.

挺美的，若是做成电影那也是优秀作品。平行宇宙，架空历史，幻想，一本正经的科幻，蝴蝶效应，世界线的变动，时间悖论，蒸汽朋克。游戏的脑洞挺大，还有一些哲学智慧、反乌托邦和“宗教艺术”，游戏画面风格和操作都有些特色，但是自由度不高，应该不耐玩，主要还是剧情精彩。最后的结局点题“无限”，用dlc把故事画成一个圈。
如果各位大佬接受fps和普通的玩法又喜欢科幻题材，若是有时间，这款游戏肯定是值得一玩的。

Before playing Bioshock Infinite, i strongly suggest to play the first Bioshock chapter, in order to get the full experience that will blow up your mind. 

The game storyline is a true masterpiece, made by brilliant minds. 
Bioshock 1 + Infinite + Burial at Sea DLC made a perfect circle, like they were planning it from a long time. 

The gameplay is simple, intuitive and fun, with difficulty levels conform to every kind of player. 

For these reasons and more, Infinite quickly became my favourite game of all time.

Story: 10/10 

The story is very engaging, with the most prodigious of story elements, with many plot convulsions, that will make you lament in your seat. 

Gameplay: 9/10

The gameplay spectrum is very vast, from the shooting and the powers that you attain throughout the game. The gameplay almost always stays interesting and engaging. It sometimes can feel repetitive but overall is very good.

Music: 8/10 

The music is very fitting, and feels very natural for the settings that you encounter.Thats all I have to say about the topic.

Level design: 9/10 

The levels or zones that you find yourself in, are always engaging and are- for the most good, and it will always keep your interest.

Graphics: 9/10 

The graphics are very good even if they are on the lowest settings, the game still look good. Maybe not "spectacular" but still good. It goes for a kind of cell-shaded feeling. Overall very well done.



Overall the game is very good. And I played through it 3 times in the first 2 weeks that I owned it. I highly recommend it to anyone that likes the FPS genre. Even if you have not played the other bioshock games to understand this one. It is very well done and overall I would have to give this game a 10/10 mainly just because of its story, gameplay and everything else. The game isn't flawless. No game truly is. But I give Bioshock infinite a solid 10/10.

Много уже написано, пару своих мыслей закину по версии без дополнений.

Дизайнерам, моделерам и художникам большое спасибо - выглядит потрясающе, жалко нет монитора побольше. Т.к. тут нет постоянно появляющихся врагов как в оригинальном Биошок, то можно спокойно ходить и рассматривать.

Хорошие находки с аэротрассами и разрывами, больше возможностей и вариаций в бою, более драйвово. Жаль врагов не так много.

Про Элизабет только ленивый не писал.

Минусы (на мой взгляд):
 - Мало перестрелок и врагов.
 - Только два оружия при себе, сделали хотя бы три, или совсем без ограничений. Боезапас для всего таскаем так и так.
 - Нет окончательной смерти (есть только на самом тяжёлом уровне сложности). Понимаю, сюжетно объяснимо, но всё же.
 - Система сохранений по контрольным точкам.
 - Сюжет. Он интересен, бесспорно, прекрасная подача, неожиданные повороты. Но лично я не люблю эти махинации с [spoiler] пространством-временем. Подобные сюжеты слишком сильно ломают мою голову ещё со времён сериала Lost. В играх всё может быть, но это пространство-время позволяет плюнуть на логику и объяснения, потому что теперь ВОЗМОЖНО ВООБЩЕ ВСЁ. Почему? ПОТОМУ. В предыдущих частях сюжет был более логичен при всей своей фантастичности. К сожалению, концовка здесь не стала для меня откровением, заранее догадался почти обо всём. Отсутствие финальной битвы со злодеем радует, наконец-то поняли, что это ни к чему.[/spoiler]

Несмотря на минусы получил огромное удовольствие. Рекомендую всем. 9/10.

Пошёл проходить дополнения.

Em Bioshock infinite você assume o controle de Booker Dewitt no qual é enviado à cidade de Columbia para resgatar uma Moça, chamada Elizabeth que foi mantida em cativeiro na maior parte de sua vida, com objetivo de quitar suas dívidas feitas pelo seu vício em álcool e jogos de azar.  
No decorrer do jogo tu passaras por vários cenários lindos em Columbia uma cidade cheia de cor, alegria e cheia de vida, você verá vários NPCs alegres e contentes. 

  Mas nem tudo é um Mar de flores após regatar Elizabeth você enfrentará duas facções presentes em Columbia os Nativistas, a Elite dos Fundadores, que mantem a cidade para os americanos puros e a Vox Populi, rebeldes representando as pessoas comuns. 

  Durante este conflito, Booker descobre que a moça na qual ele resgatou possui poderes, ela manipula fendas, Além de descobrir também que [spoiler]ela é a peça central de tudo.[/spoiler] 

  A jogabilidade de Bioshock inifinite é similar à de seus antecessores, o jogo se trata de um shooter em 1 pessoa com elementos de Rpg. Booker no decorrer do jogo adquiri poderes através dos Vigores que se encontram em vários cantos por Columbia  

  Há várias maneiras de ser concluir uma fase pois o jogo possui caminhos diferentes para chegar no inimigo, você se deparará bastante com os aero trilhos que são muito legais de se usar, as vezes para fugir de um tiroteio, como também para pegar um inimigo desprevenido  

  A trilha sonora do jogo são músicas com estilo antigo para se adaptar com a época do game, e por sinal, são ótimas músicas. 

  Na minha humilde opinião digo que esse Bioshock é o melhor da Série, e recomendo a todos que comprem essa verdadeira obra de arte.

+ Great, multidimensional story that makes you wanna THINK and investigate into its fragments
+ Concepts of quantum physics and multiverse arranged into story
+ Multiple brilliant plot twists
+ Good pace of a game and a lot of action 
+ Beautiful and innovative graphics and level design (floating cities!)
+ Great soundtrack

- A bit repetitive towards the end
- Too much action sometimes (subjective point)

Overall: 85/100

BioShock'u BioShock yapan neydi? Tabi ki derin hikayesi, retro-fütüristik atmosferi, kendine has birinci şahıs mekanikleri ve maskotlaşmış olan sübyancı robotları... Bugün BioShock Infinite adlı oyunu inceliyorum. Deli gibi materyal yağmaladığımız BioShock'un üçüncü oyunu, İlk iki oyunun geçtiği sanat, bilim ve özgür düşünce ile kafayı yiyip işleri çığrından çıkarmış olan Rapture şehrinden bahsetmeyeceğim. Çünkü BioShock bizi denizin derinliklerinden göklere çıkarıyor son oyunuyla.

Neresinden başlayacağımı bilmiyorum gökyüzünde yüzen Columbia şehrini anlatmaya. 85 yılda inşa edilen Columbia her tarafı propaganda afişleriyle dolu yozlaşmış eğitim ile beyni yıkanan cahil bir nesil yetiştiren, yöneticisi Comstok'un kendini peygamber ilan ettiği ve insanların dini sömürü ve ırk din ayrımı yapılarak bölünüp yönetildiği uçan bir şehir. Bu şehir beyaz adam sevdalısı ve tam bir Amerikan faşizanı öyle ki Amerika kurucu liderleri birer peygamber kabul edilmişken, siyahileri kölelikte kurtaran Abraham Lincoln bir şeytan olarak tasfir edilmiş. Kızılderili, Amerikan ya da Çinli olmayan her ırk kusurlu ırk. Şehirdeki beyaz adamlar huzur ve refah içinde yaşarken alt ve fakir sınıfın ise tamamını diğer ırklar oluşturuyor. Şehirde bir beyazın siyahi ile olan aşkı büyük bir suç. Aynı zamanda uçan şehir Nuh'un gemisine de benzetiliyor.

Oyun boyunca şehrin her yerini geziyor ve farklı amaca hitap eden ve farklı siyasi görüşleri olan örgütlerin bir çoğunu ziyaret ediyoruz. Öncelikle atmosferden bahsedeyim. BioShock Infinite'nin atmosferi şüphesiz ilk 10'a girer benim için. Yapım ekibi ince ince animasyon çalışmış ve bize retro-füturistik bir şehirde geçen günümüz bir çok bilim-kurgu filminden çok daha başarılı bir hikaye anlatmış. Tüm mekanlar ince ince tasarlanmış. Görev rotasını değiştirip biraz şehri gezdiğimizde büyüleniyor ve yaşadığını hissediyoruz şehrin. Piknik yapan insanlar, satıcılar, cugara çeken çocuklar, dans edenler, güneşlenenler, dinlenenler, karnavallar, oyunlar, oyuncaklar... Şehrin her yerinde bir aktivite var ve animasyonlar neredeyse kendini hiç tekrar etmiyor.

Şehirde kendi başına takılan her sivil için ayrı bi replik yazılmış herhangi bir binanın her hangi bir odasına girdiğinizde bile odanın tasarımı anlamlı bir şekilde dizayn edilmiş. Columbia gerçekten yaşayan bir şehir. Etrafta birçok şeyle etkileşime girilebiliyor. Zaten her şey de lootlanabiliyor. Lootla babam lootla.

Ana karekterimiz Booker DeWitt ise kumar borcunun kapanması karşılığında bu uçan şehirde hapis tutulan bir kızı kurtarması için gökyüzüne yollanıyor. Bu hikayemizin girişi elbette, fakat oyunun hikayesi kitaplara sığmayacak kadar derin ve karmaşık. Öyle ki etraftaki tüm ses kayıtlarını dinleseniz bile oyun bittiğinde kesin olarak açıklanmayan ve üzerine teori yürütmemiz için eksik bırakılan hikaye ögeleri mevcut. Ya da sığmamış ta olabilir. Elizabeth'ten de bahsetmesek olmaz elbette, çünkü o da oyunun başardığı en iyi şeylerden biri. Ve Elizabeth büyük konuşmayayım ama şimdiye kadarki en gerçekçi takip karekteri. Gezdiğimiz her mekana ayak uyduruyor, savaştığımızda saklanıyor, etrafı inceliyor, sigara içen birinin yanında gerçekten öksürüyor, erkekler tuvaletine girmeyip bize acele etmenizi söylüyor, etraftaki insanlarla sohbet ediyor ve çok ama çok daha fazlası... Takipçi karekterimiz etrafla sürekli etkileşimde savaş esnasında size yardımcı olacak etmenleri paralel evrenlerden getiriyor. Hatta sizin için etrafı bile lootluyor. Elizabeth size co-op modda bir arkadaşınızla oynuyormuşsunuz hissi veriyor. Oyunun mekaniklerinden bahsedicek olursak bir çoğu ilk iki oyunla aynı. Big DADDY yerine Handy Manler var. Sadece iki silah taşıyabiliyoruz ve mermi alıp, Vigor ve silah upgradei yapabileceğimiz otomatlar bu oyunda da mevcut. Bunun dışında sağ tuşla kullanabileceğimiz ateş ve elektrik atmamızı vb. sağlayan bir çok Vigor mevcut. İşin içine bir de kancamız girince oyun klasik FPS mekaniklerinden uzaklaşıp kişisel bir savaş deneyimi yaşamamızı sağlıyor.

Oyun ne hikayesiyle ne de mekaniksel olarak kendini pek tekrar etmiyor. Grafikler gayet başarılı, ışık ve karanlık harika kullanılmış ve evet Unreal 3'ün suyu çıkarılar yapılmış bir oyun olduğu için kaplamalar bazen geç geliyor. Oyunu normal moddan yüksekte oynarsak düşmanlarımız kafalarından bile tek seferde ölmediği için akıcı savaş mekanikleri topallamaya başlıyor. Oyunun hikayesine diyecek bir şey bulamıyorum, zira işin içinede parelel evrenler girince olanları ağzımız çık izliyoruz. Gayet etkileyici bir gidişata ve başarılı bir sona sahip. Fakat oyunun alt hikayesi çok derin olduğundan ve BioShock bir RPG olmadığı için oyun ne kadar etkileyici sahne içerse de hikayenin tamamını akıcı bir şekilde anlatmayı başaramıyor. Çünkü her oyuncu tüm mapi ayrıntısıyla dolaşıp etraftaki tüm ses kayıtlarını toplayıp sırasıyla dinlemek istemiyebilir. Bir FPS oyunundan ne bekliyorsanız hepsi fazlası ile mevcut BioShock Infinite'de. Bu da aşkla yapılmış oyunlarda biri. BioShock Infinite kesin ve net olarak 7. neslin en iyi oyunları arasında benim için. Oynamayan varsa oynamalı kesinlikle.

Grafik : 86
Senaryo : 90
Oyunculuk : 95
Ses ve Müzik : 88

Genel : 89,75 ten 90

Not: İnceleme 14 Ağustos 2017 tarihinde yazıldı
This game is even worth 100 dollars.
